articles.content: In her upcoming memoir Becoming, first seen by the Associated Press, Michelle Obama discusses her life as the wife of former President Barack Obama, delving into topics such as her experiences of racism and difficulties with her marriage, going as far as to a… [+1121 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Morris
articles.title: DC Police Investigating Protest at Tucker Carlson’s Home as ‘Suspected Hate Crime’
articles.description: Police in D.C. are now investigating a left-wing mob protest that occured Wednesday evening at the home of Fox News Channel's Tucker Carlson, citing vandalism of Carlson's home and car.
articles.content: A police report obtained by The Daily Caller News Foundation reveals police are investigating the matter as a “suspected hate crime.” One box labeled hate bias/motivation was filled in anti-political. Smash Racism DC, the group responsible for the protest, sh… [+2021 chars]

articles.author: Edwin Mora
articles.title: U.S., Taliban to Join Russia-Hosted Afghan Peace Talks
articles.description: The United States and the Taliban, in a move described as unprecedented, reportedly agreed to participate in the second round of negotiations to end the more than 17-year-old war in Afghanistan on Friday.
articles.content: The Taliban said the talks will be aimed on finding a peaceful solution to the Afghan quandary and ending American occupation. Last year, the U.S. and the Taliban reportedly refused to attend the first meeting Moscow hosted. Russias foreign ministry billed Fr… [+4706 chars]

articles.author: John Binder
articles.title: Florida Official Overseeing Vote Count Destroyed Ballots, Accused of Not Removing Dead Voters from Rolls
articles.description: The Florida official put in charge of counting votes in Broward County for the state's gubernatorial and Senate racespreviously destroyed voter ballots, a judge ruled, and was most recently accused of not removing dead voters from the voter rolls.
articles.content: Broward County Board of Elections Supervisor Brenda Snipes is in charge of vote counting in the area and has yet to disclose how many ballots are still not counted despite the election for governor and Senate occurring two days ago. Currently, in the Senate r… [+3059 chars]

articles.author: Katherine Rodriguez
articles.title: VIDEO: Baltimore High School Teacher Punched in Face
articles.description: A student who got into a verbal altercation with a Baltimore high school teacher Wednesday allegedly punched the teacher in the face, according to a viral video posted on Facebook.
articles.content: The video shows the student at Frederick Douglass High School getting into a verbal altercation with the teacher when the situation escalated. F*** is you talking about? Don’t f***ing get smart with me, straight up, the student said, pushing another student b… [+1274 chars]

articles.author: Ben Kew
articles.title: Islamic ‘Vaccine Fatwa’ Triggers Plunging Vaccination Rates in Indonesia
articles.description: Many children in Indonesia are missing out on crucial vaccines because of a "vaccine fatwa" imposed by power Islamic clerics, Science Magazine reported on Thursday.
articles.content: In August, Indonesia’s leading Islamic body issued a religious decree, otherwise known as a fatwa, declaring the Rubella-Measles vaccine as haram because pig cells are used in its manufacturing. Vaccination rates have plummeted significantly since the ruling … [+2420 chars]

articles.author: John Binder
articles.title: Districts with Large Foreign-Born Populations Sent Far-Left Democrats to Congress
articles.description: Congressional Districts with booming foreign-born populations sent some of the most far-left, socialist Democrats to Congress in the midterm elections this week.
articles.content: On Tuesday night, congressional districts that have been dramatically changed by mass immigration elected Democrats like Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez in New York, Ilhan Omar in Minnesota, and Ayanna Pressley in Massachusettes. The congressional districts sending … [+5153 chars]

articles.title: DeVos Releases ‘Guide’ for Parents to Understand Report Cards Mandated by Federal Law
articles.description: In the guide, the education department explains that ESSA requires student report cards to display information about how much money from federal, state, and local sources is spent per student for each school.

articles.title: Henry Olsen: GOP Can’t Win with Half-MAGA; ‘You’re Either In or You’re Out’
articles.description: Henry Olsen said the GOP must embrace Donald Trump's new political coalition to secure its future viability as a political party.

articles.author: Penny Starr, Penny Starr
articles.title: Watch Live: Leftists Rally at White House to Protest Trump, Protect Mueller
articles.description: Protesters were at the White House to protest the resignation of Attorney General Jeff Sessions claiming it threatens the DOJ's Russia probe.
articles.content: Protesters believe Sessions’ resignation will lead to the undoing of Special Counsel Robert Muellers investigation into alleged collusion between Russia and the Trump presidential campaign. In firing Jeff Sessions, Donald Trump has crossed a red line and star… [+2085 chars]
